janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha ehidi kiyasitiye eekadhipathi palanayaka yugaya nima karamin janathawa illa siti nidahasa saha prajathanthrawadaya siyayata siyayakin nowa siyayata desiyakin warthamanayedi rata thula thahawuru kara athi bawa ya.

- lanwima sabhapathibuddhika brahmanagewruththiya samithi deka thunaka kriyakarin pirisak kumanthranakari lesa widulibala mandalaye sewakayin nomanga yawamin ehi katayuthu adala kirimata gath uthsahaya mulumaninma asarthaka wi athayi widulibala mandalaye sabhapathi widya amarapala mahatha pawasayi.adhyaksha mandalayath wruththiya samithi niyojithayinuth athara pawathi awasan sakachchawedi samithi kriyakarinta niwaradi awabodhayak laba dun bawa pawasana hethema dushitha niladharin aaraksha kirime wada satahanakata bahutharayak sewakayin menma wruththiya samithi kriyakarin da wiruddha bawa ema sakachchawen thahawuru wu bawa da pawasiya.wruththiya eekadhikarayak pawathwa ganime apekshawen kriyakarana atham wruththiya samithi ee sandaha prayathna daruwa da wadi denaku eewata sahaya nodena nisa widulibala mandalaye katayuthu samanya paridi sidu kirimata hakiyawa labi athayi da ohu kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
